title: SEC wants to hire crypto experts, but job candidates won’t sell their holdings
description:
The U.S. Security and Exchange Commission (SEC) is facing challenges in recruiting cryptocurrency experts, a problem partly attributed to its own policies, as highlighted in a recent agency document. That document, published in October and modified Nov. 2, is titled The Inspector General’s Statement on the SEC’s Management and Performance Challenges. It indicates that the […]

The post SEC wants to hire crypto experts, but job candidates won’t sell their holdings appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin Jesus Is Suing Matrixport’s Smart Vega Over $8M Frozen Funds
description:
Crypto angel investor and “Bitcoin Jesus” Roger Ver is locked in a legal battle with crypto financial services firm Matrixport over the freezing of funds amounting to $8 million. Ver’s lawsuit has charged Smart Vega, a Matrixport subsidiary, with freezing his funds. The suit alleges that Jihan Wu, co-founder of Matrixport, is behind the freeze. […]

The post Bitcoin Jesus Is Suing Matrixport’s Smart Vega Over $8M Frozen Funds appeared first on Coin Edition.
